data_descriptor.name: temperature
data_descriptor.description: It contains, min, max, and current temperature. Keys are: temp (current temperature), temp_min (minimum temperature), temp_max (maximum temperature)

data_descriptor.name: humidity
data_descriptor.description: Percentage of humidity. Min is 0 and max is 100.

data_descriptor.name: wind
data_descriptor.description: Speed and degree of wind. Keys are: deg and speed.

data_descriptor.name: other
data_descriptor.description: Summary of the weather in text.

algorithm.description: This stream provides various weather statistics of a participant's location.
